content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)
### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
-  Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the electricity network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using belt groups without items
-  Ensure that belt groups have items to transport before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
- `burner_miner_position`: Position of the burner mining drill (x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- `stone_furnace_position`: Position of the stone furnace (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- `offshore_pump_position`: Position of the offshore pump (x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- `boiler_position`: Position of the boiler (x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- `steam_engine_position`: Position of the steam engine (x=117.5 y=-30.5)
*Utility functions:*
- `get_entity_status(entity)`: Returns the status of the given entity.
- `get_entity_position(entity)`: Returns the position of the given entity.
*Failure modes:*
- `burner_miner_no_fuel`: Burner mining drill has no fuel.
- `stone_furnace_no_ingredients`: Stone furnace has no ingredients.
- `steam_engine_not_connected`: Steam engine is not connected to the electricity network.
*Success modes:*
- `burner_miner_working`: Burner mining drill is working.
- `stone_furnace_working`: Stone furnace is working.
- `steam_engine_working`: Steam engine is working.
